Trailer:

Thank you for your kind comments and feedback on my other torrents, your feedback is welcome.


About the Series:
A body is found murdered and posed on a construction site in MalmÃ¶, Sweden, in a tableau meant 
to evoke a traditional family. 
Saga is assigned to the case, and proceeds to Denmark when the victim is identified as Helle Anker, 
a resident of Copenhagen. Hanne Thomsen (Kirsten Olesen), the Copenhagen police officer assigned 
to work with her, appears not to like her, but denies that this is due to Saga's role in the 
incarceration of Martin Rohde, who is serving 10 years in prison for killing Jens. 
On investigation it is discovered that Anker, a lesbian married to a Swedish woman, was the pioneer 
of Denmark's first gender-neutral preschool. 
Her work had been the target of numerous threats, including several vlog posts by right-wing lawyer 
Lise Frise Andersen (Sonja Richter), whose husband owns the facility where Anker's body was discovered. 
While attempting to question Anker's son Morten (AsbjÃ¸rn Krogh Nissen), a mentally unstable veteran 
of the war in Afghanistan, Thomsen is wounded by a booby trap. Saga is then assigned a new Danish partner, 
Henrik Sabroe (Thure Lindhardt), whose private life seems murky. Henrik recognises Saga's neurological 
condition almost immediately, and is more accommodating than Hanne. As the investigation progresses, 
Saga's bond with Henrik becomes deeper and more emotional.


I hope you enjoy.
